description.part1: As a pragmatic Full Stack developer, I specialize in building robust and scalable applications. My goal is to understand your unique challenges to deliver solutions that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
description.part2: I believe in choosing the right tool for the job, not just following the latest trend. This approach allows me to build efficient and sustainable solutions that meet your goals without unnecessary complexity.

java_dev.title: Java Development
java_dev.description: Building robust Spring Boot APIs and custom Minecraft plugins (Paper, Velocity, BungeeCord).

web_dev.title: Web Development
web_dev.description: Designing and developing modern websites and custom applications tailored to your needs.

admin.title: System Administration
admin.description: Complete server management: configuration, security hardening, performance optimization and incident resolution.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Personalized technical support, architecture advice, debugging and assistance for all your projects.

contact.title: Would you like to contact me?
contact.description: Feel free to send me a message using the form or the contact methods below. I will respond as soon as possible.

content.part1: Passionate about technology, I thrive in both programming and managing my own servers. This dual role gives me a deep understanding of the software lifecycle, from design to deployment. My curious side has even led me to electronics, where I've been able to create tangible projects like an outdoor alarm and a weather station.
content.part2: Outside of the digital world, I like to recharge through a variety of activities. Rock climbing and calisthenics allow me to push myself physically and mentally. Gardening offers me a bubble of tranquility, while trading stimulates my analytical mind. Each of these hobbies enriches my perspective and my ability to approach challenges with creativity and resilience.

BlogPage.description: Articles covering a wide range of topics in technology, development, and system administration, all written in English.

Legals.title: Legal Notice
Legals.editor_tva: VAT not applicable, art. 293 B of the CGI

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section_1_text: I do not collect any personal data except for the information submitted via the contact form. This information is used solely to respond to your requests and is deleted after use.
privacy.section_2_text: The collected data is used only to respond to your inquiries. It is never shared with third parties unless necessary for communication management.
privacy.section_2_item_2: Handling requests via the contact form
privacy.section_3_text: I use a self-hosted tracker to analyze website performance. No data is collected for profit purposes. Tracker link: https://rybbit.farmeurimmo.fr
privacy.section_4_text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact me by email or via the contact form.
privacy.contact_form_label: Contact form available on the website.
privacy.third_party_services_text: Please note that some third-party services, such as Vercel and Cloudflare, may collect information related to site performance and security. These services are used solely to optimize the user experience and not for profit.
privacy.third_party_v2: Cloudflare: Site security and protection against attacks

projects.title: My current and old projects
projects.description: Discover my past and current projects here. They are all open source and available on my GitHub account. You may find more projects on my GitHub account.
